Comment: It's  awesome camera is very good battery backup is excellent in this range this is best I love it THANKS #Micromax #in for India #the blockbuster

Name: Rahul Polampalli
Comment: It's worth every penny spent..smart looks, good camera with different modes capture as you wish, video quality and audio quality both are good.I didn't face any heating issue even after full charge. Happy to buy, good smart phone at this price range.

Comment: I'm purchased Micromax IN 1 6 GB RAM & 128 GB ROM 26th march & the product will be delivered in my address is only 2 days waiting that is 28th march will be delivered very first delivery & very good product & quality IN for INDIA🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳 JAI HIND MICROMAX & HAPPY HOLI🙏🙏 WISH U ALL THE BEST

Name: UJJWAL KUMAR SINGH
Comment: Awesome 😎 phone! Under this range you never gonna to get 6GB/128GB.Flipkart service is also excellent. They deliver just in 2 days.Overall this is best phone you must go with it . Camera is nice but so much good as one can expect from 48MP. Battery is also good. Is comes with huge display and very attractive looking.By my side It is the best.Thankyou Micromax and Flipkart. ❤️❤️🥰

Name: Flipkart Customer
Comment: Received the device 2 days back... Delivery was before time... prompt delivery by flipkart...sharing views of two days usage...Superb product...very value for money...one can buy this product blindly...full of features at a very low price...FM radio sound quality to be improved...battery backup is very good since it's a new phone but don't know about future...it came with tempered glass and transparent back cover... it's good but the quality is not upto the mark of both... overall amazing pr...
